Article.Title: Ooma CEO Eric Stang Shows Off The New HD2 VoIP Handset
Article.Content: Facebook LinkedIn Ooma TC Smartphone at CES 2012 At CES 2012, there are quite a few products that would totally change the way you do things (or at least save you some money) that just don’t get enough coverage. We reported on Ooma’s new HD2 VoIP handset, but nothing beats getting the facts straight from the CEO of the company. Luckily, Eric Stang had a chance to meet with us and chat it up. He explained that, while unnecessary, the HD2 Revel pretty much eliminates the need for a land-line. It’s basically a smartphone (or a smartphone-like handset) that pairs with the Ooma base station to offer VoIP services in your home. It also offers HD calling and caller ID with images collected from your Facebook, Google and Yahoo friends. The handset should be available in February at select retailers and Ooma.com for $60.
